phaseBar.feedback: This is a new service – your feedback will help us to improve it.

inactivityTimeout.title: Want more time to continue?
inactivityTimeout.expiringIn: Your session will expire in 2:00 minutes
inactivityTimeout.text: The information you have entered will be deleted to protect your personal data.

notFound.title: Page cannot be found
notFound.message: Check that you’ve entered the correct web address
nextSteps: start of Appeal a benefit decision

serverError.title: Sorry, we’re experiencing technical difficulties
serverError.message: Please try again in a few minutes.

timeout.message: If you do not do anything for 20 minutes, then this page will time out.

webform.title: Send us a message
webform.desc: You’ll get a response by email within 2 working days.
webform.link: Send message (opens in a new window)

webchat.title: Web chat
webchat.desc: Get some help by messaging an agent online.
webchat.textChatDown:
Web chat is currently unavailable.
 Please try again later or call us on the number below if your enquiry is urgent.
webchat.textChatWithAnAgent: Start web chat (opens in a new window)
webchat.textNoAgentsAvailable: No agents are available, please try again later.
webchat.textAllAgentsBusy:
All our web chat agents are busy helping other people.
 Please try again later or contact us using one of the ways below.
webchat.textChatClosed:
Web chat is now closed. 
 Come back Monday to Friday 8:30am to 5pm. Or contact us using one of the ways below.
webchat.textChatAlreadyOpen: A web chat window is already open.

telephone.title: Telephone
telephone.desc: Talk to one of our agents now over the phone.
